channel.title: Tibikra [Pk all day][All action in wilderness] [Not only PvP][New server]
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://sphotos-a.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-snc7/400028_518539504835371_1643663764_n.jpg[/img][/CENTER] [SIZE=5][COLOR=#FF8C00]Welcome to Tibikra[/COLOR][/SIZE] [QUOTE] Tibikra is a large and established private server and community with friendly administrators and users. The server has excellent stability with a range of good features for pvpers and skillers alike. [/QUOTE] [SIZE=5][COLOR=#FF8C00]Start playing now[/COLOR][/SIZE] You can play Tibikra, through our [URL=http://www.tibikra.net/webclient/][COLOR=#008080]web client[/COLOR][/URL].
[SIZE=5][COLOR=#008000]Some features:[/COLOR][/SIZE] * 24/7 hosting on CentOS (extreme stability!) [B]* Custom Bounty hunter minigame and allow items till 2007! Also with ELO rating ([COLOR=#FF0000]![/COLOR])[/B] * No more monster teleport. Every monster are spawned in wilderness! * Just started
[B][SIZE=4][COLOR=#A52A2A]Media:[/COLOR][/SIZE][/B] [URL=http://www.tibikra.net/webclient/] [IMG]http://www.tibikra.net/TibikraGifs/hybriding.gif[/img] [img]http://www.tibikra.net/TibikraGifs/dice.gif[/img] [img]http://www.tibikra.net/TibikraGifs/spirit.gif[/img] [img]http://www.tibikra.net/TibikraGifs/autocasting.gif[/img] [img]http://www.tibikra.net/TibikraGifs/shop.gif[/img] [IMG]http://sphotos-b.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash3/540877_519238444765477_170379707_n.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://sphotos-c.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-prn1/553244_519238461432142_2089557236_n.jpg[/img] [/url] [URL=http://www.tibikra.net/webclient/] [B][CENTER][SIZE=5][COLOR=#800000]Bounty Hunter[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER][/B] [IMG]http://sphotos-h.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/3802_521426701213318_1890149728_n.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://sphotos-f.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash4/603057_521426591213329_554946263_n.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://sphotos-g.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-prn1/71879_521426491213339_197961257_n.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://sphotos-d.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash3/580689_521426641213324_1465081807_n.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://sphotos-h.ak.fbcdn.net/hphotos-ak-ash3/74952_521426454546676_674985035_n.jpg[/img] [/url] [CENTER][URL=http://www.tibikra.net/webclient/][SIZE=6]Play[COLOR=#008080] tibikra[/COLOR] now[/SIZE][/URL] [URL=http://www.tibikra.net/index.php?page=downloadable-client/][SIZE=6]Download[COLOR=#008080] tibikra[/COLOR] now[/SIZE][/URL] [URL=http://www.tibikra.net/][SIZE=6]Visit[COLOR=#008080] tibikra[/COLOR] website[/SIZE][/URL][/CENTER]

item.title: Tibikra [Pk all day][All action in wilderness] [Not only PvP][New server]
item.dc:creator: @sernas sernas
item.description:
@sernas wrote:

[CENTER][/CENTER]
[SIZE=5][COLOR=#FF8C00]Welcome to Tibikra[/COLOR][/SIZE]

Tibikra is a large and established private server and community with friendly administrators and users. The server has excellent stability with a range of good features for pvpers and skillers alike.

[SIZE=5][COLOR=#FF8C00]Start playing now[/COLOR][/SIZE]
You can play Tibikra, through our [COLOR=#008080]web client[/COLOR].

[SIZE=5][COLOR=#008000]Some features:[/COLOR][/SIZE]

  • 24/7 hosting on CentOS (extreme stability!)
    * Custom Bounty hunter minigame and allow items till 2007! Also with ELO rating ([COLOR=#FF0000]![/COLOR])
  • No more monster teleport. Every monster are spawned in wilderness!
  • Just started

[SIZE=4][COLOR=#A52A2A]Media:[/COLOR][/SIZE]










[CENTER][SIZE=5][COLOR=#800000]Bounty Hunter[/COLOR][/SIZE][/CENTER]






[CENTER][SIZE=6]Play[COLOR=#008080] tibikra[/COLOR] now[/SIZE]
[SIZE=6]Download[COLOR=#008080] tibikra[/COLOR] now[/SIZE]
[SIZE=6]Visit[COLOR=#008080] tibikra[/COLOR] website[/SIZE][/CENTER]
